description.p: A pearlescent, sparkling brew procured from the feywilds from the realm of Hyrsam himself. Good luck. On drinking, gain the following effect for an hour unless otherwise stated:

tr.td: Roll a D6 and a D20. For the next hour, your ability score matching the D6 roll (1=STR,2=DEX,etc) is now the D20 result.
Gain 60 ft of magical flight.
You turn into a gnome.
Your head is twice as big. Gain a +2 to your Wisdom and Intelligence score, and a -1 to AC.
Your head is twice as small. Gain a +2 to your Dexterity ability score and AC, and a -2 to Intelligence score.
You turn invisible but only while you are dancing.
Your true name and location is revealed to the nearest fey.
The potion is full of endless beer. Gain a +2 to your Strength ability score, and a -4 to Dexterity ability score.
Your mom contacts you in the most expedious way.
Your punches cast fireball centered on your fists with spell shaping.
Your jump distance is tripled.
Roll a D4. For the next minute, you projectile vomit the matching liquid a distance of 10 feet. (water, grease, acid, beer)
Planeshift to the feywild for the next d4 rounds.
Hyrsam finds out you stole brew from his realm.
You cannot lie. Make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 12). On a failed save, you compulsively tell the truth.
A magical fey barrier surrounds you, increasing your AC by 5 for the next minute.
You can understand and speak all languages.
You can speak with plants.
Your worst fear materializes as a phantasmal force.
Your pupils dilate, letting you to see 140 feet through magical and non-magical darkness as if it is bright light, but you also faintly see the overlay of the feywilds.
Faerie Fire is cast on you.
When you open your mouth, the sound of a fiddle playing a jig comes out.
You become the good kind of drunk and have advantage on all charisma skill checks and saving throws.
You can cast Eldritch Blast using Charisma as your spellcasting modifyer.
Your pockets explode with 2,000 copper coins.
